definition[0]: if a liquid boils over when it is heated, it rises and flows over the side of the container
example[0]: The milk was boiling over on the stove behind her.
definition[1]: if a situation or an emotion boils over, the people involved stop being calm
example[1]: All the bitterness of the last two years seemed to boil over.
example[2]: Anger eventually boils over into words that are later regretted.
